figure_1: Procedure. The present study was based on data collected between January 2013 and July 2021. At the end of the survey period, some treatments had already been completed, while others were still ongoing. Data analysis was based on completed psychotherapeutic treatments. SCL-K11 = Short Version of the Hopkins Symptom Checklist; OPD-SQ = Operationalised Psychodynamic Diagnosis Structure Questionnaire; APC = Questionnaire for the Assessment of Adverse and Protective Childhood Experiences; SCID = Structured Clinical Interview.
